description:
About The Company

Our client is a large media group, seeking a Data Analyst to join their streaming services platform. The team is working on identifying and analyzing user data to better market their content.

Responsibilities

  • Leverage advanced SQL skills to query and manipulate data efficiently in AWS and other relevant platforms
  • Identify and resolve data-related challenges, including stakeholder requests and data integrity/accuracy
  • Assess and enhance existing processes to optimize data pipelines and improve overall system efficiency
  • Document data models, queries, and processes
  • Conduct rigorous testing of data solutions to uphold data standards and ensure the reliability of analytical outputs
  • Develop and deliver high-impact insights and visualizations built on aggregated, large panel and user-level data sets
  • Work with data at all stages of the analysis lifecycle
  • Manage multiple priorities across a mix of ad-hoc and operational projects
  • Work closely with the team, partner teams, and stakeholder groups to understand business requirements to provide valuable insights

Requirements

  • Bachelors degree in in a quantitative field
  • 3-5 years of experience in data analytics or business intelligence
  • Working experience or interest in media industry, streaming, digital marketing or technology
  • Proficient with SQL or other data manipulation languages
  • Experience analyzing and mining large datasets
  • Experience with data visualization techniques and platforms (Tableau, Looker, DOMO, etc.)

Salary Range

$80,000-$95,000
